skills.name: Abyssal Orb
skills.description: An orb of pure void energy that seeks out your enemies, dealing a large amount of void damage to the target and a smaller amount in an area around them.Added spell damage applies to the primary hit at 200% effectiveness and at 100% to the area of effect.

skills.name: Abyssal Rift
skills.description: Repeatedly casts Abyssal Echoes

skills.name: Acid Trap
skills.description: Cast a ball of fire towards the target

skills.name: Acid Trap
skills.description: Cast a ball of fire towards the target

skills.name: Aerial Assault
skills.description: Freezes enemies in a cone in front of you. Freeze lasts for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Anger Swarm
skills.description: Creates a thorn shield around yourself and up to 5 nearby allies then trasforms you into Spriggan Form.
skills.additionalInfo: Thorn Shield grants 40 armor and shoots out thorns at nearby enemies which deal physical spell damage when it ends.

skills.name: Anomaly
skills.description: Brings enemies that were sent forward back to your time.

skills.name: Arboreal Protection
skills.description: Creates a thorn shield around yourself and up to 5 nearby allies then trasforms you into Spriggan Form.
skills.additionalInfo: Thorn Shield grants 40 armor and shoots out thorns at nearby enemies which deal physical spell damage when it ends.

skills.name: Arboreal Protection
skills.description: Creates a thorn shield around yourself and up to 5 nearby allies then trasforms you into Spriggan Form.
skills.additionalInfo: Thorn Shield grants 40 armor and shoots out thorns at nearby enemies which deal physical spell damage when it ends.

skills.name: Arcane Ascendance
skills.description: Toggle to prevent movement and drain 25 mana each second. Mana drain increases by 1 mana per second. All spells cost +5 mana to cast. 100% increased spell damage and 50% increased cast speed.

skills.name: Arcane Lightning
skills.description: Hurl a bolt of lightning at the target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Armblade Slash
skills.description: Every third consecutive attack with Rive slashes in a full circle around the character, lacerating enemies it hits.
skills.additionalInfo: Lacerated enemies take melee damage over time for 3 seconds, equal to 100% of your added melee damage. Laceration does not stack.The consecutive attack counter resets if you go 3 seconds without using Rive.The third hit has 200% added damage effectiveness.

skills.name: Armblade Slash
skills.description: Every third consecutive attack with Rive slashes in a full circle around the character, lacerating enemies it hits.
skills.additionalInfo: Lacerated enemies take melee damage over time for 3 seconds, equal to 100% of your added melee damage. Laceration does not stack.The consecutive attack counter resets if you go 3 seconds without using Rive.The third hit has 200% added damage effectiveness.

skills.name: Armblade Slash
skills.description: Every third consecutive attack with Rive slashes in a full circle around the character, lacerating enemies it hits.
skills.additionalInfo: Lacerated enemies take melee damage over time for 3 seconds, equal to 100% of your added melee damage. Laceration does not stack.The consecutive attack counter resets if you go 3 seconds without using Rive.The third hit has 200% added damage effectiveness.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: A basic attack with your weapon that costs no mana

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: A basic attack with your weapon that costs no mana

skills.name: Aura Of Rot
skills.description: An aura surrounding the abomination which poisons it every second. Enemies near it are poisoned four times a second, and the abomination's chance to poison on hit applies to each of these instances at 25% effectiveness.

skills.name: Avalanche
skills.description: Launches an icy boulder from the sky.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 300% effectiveness.

skills.name: Banner Rush
skills.description: Dash to your Banner. Cannot be used without a target.
skills.additionalInfo: Shares a cooldown with Lunge and Shield Rush.

skills.name: Barkskin
skills.description: Adds 4 seconds to the duration of every Thorn Shield on you and then transforms you into Werebear Form.
skills.additionalInfo: Thorn Shield grants 30 armor and shoots out thorns at nearby enemies which deal physical spell damage when it ends.

skills.name: Blade Explosion
skills.description: Umbral Blades left in the ground explode after a short delay or upon contact with an enemy.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 60% effectiveness. 40% less chance to apply ailments on hit.

skills.name: Bladestorm
skills.description: The thrown blade spins in midair, hitting nearby enemies 3 times per second for 4 seconds.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 60% effectiveness to each hit. 40% less chance to apply ailments on hit.

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description: Repeatedly strikes around a target area with hail, wind and frozen objects.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Blood Eruption
skills.description: Blood erupts from the enemy, dealing physical spell damage to it and all other enemies in an area.
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Blood Pool
skills.description: Leave a pool for blood for 3 seconds that slows enemies.

skills.name: Blood Tether
skills.description: Tethers an enemy, drawing blood from them to deal physical damage over time. Deals 1% more damage per bleed on the target.3% of damage dealt is leeched as health.
skills.additionalInfo: An enemy cannot have more than one tether at a time. Tethers last 3 seconds.Added damage is applied at 200% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Bone Eruption
skills.description: Rips bones from the target minion or yourself. The bones fly out in all directions, impaling enemies.

skills.name: Bone Shatter
skills.description: Launch splintered bones that impale enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Bone Splinters
skills.description: Launch splintered bones that impale enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Burning Dagger
skills.description: Launch a burning dagger at a nearby enemy.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Burning Dagger Cone
skills.description: Launch a cone of burning daggers at nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Burning Patch
skills.description: A Burning patch on the ground which ignites all enemies twice per second.

skills.name: Call Swarm
skills.description: Summons a Locust for each nearby stunned enemy up to a maximum of 6 and then transforms you into Swarmblade Form.

skills.name: CapsuleMan Basic Explosion
skills.description: Create a burst of fire damage around a minion. Has 400% added damage effectiveness.

skills.name: CapsuleMan Basic Explosion
skills.description: Create a burst of fire damage around a minion. Has 400% added damage effectiveness.

skills.name: CapsuleMan Basic Explosion
skills.description: Create a burst of fire damage around a minion. Has 400% added damage effectiveness.

skills.name: CapsuleMan Basic Explosion
skills.description: Create a burst of fire damage around a minion. Has 400% added damage effectiveness.

skills.name: Chakram
skills.description: Throw a single Chakram that pierces through all enemies, rebounds off terrain, and returns to you. Enemies can be hit a second time when the Chakram is returning.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Chaos Bolts
skills.description: Call a meteor from the sky that deals a large amount of damage upon landing. Added damage is applied at five times its normal value.

skills.name: Charged Ground
skills.description: Charges an area of ground, causing repeated bursts of lightning in smaller areas within it.Static Orb's damage and area bonuses based on distance travelled also apply to the Charged Ground.
skills.additionalInfo: 150% of added damage applied per second.

skills.name: Chthonic Fissure Hit
skills.description: Initial Hit for Chthonic Fissure

skills.name: Cinder Strike
skills.description: Melee or bow combo with three attacks. The first attack also creates a fiery explosion, damaging nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: The consecutive attack counter resets if you go 2 seconds without using Cinder Strike.Added damage applies to the first attack at 200% effectiveness, and to the other attacks at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Cinder Strike
skills.description: Melee or bow combo with three attacks. The first attack also creates a fiery explosion, damaging nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: The consecutive attack counter resets if you go 2 seconds without using Cinder Strike.Added damage applies to the first attack at 200% effectiveness, and to the other attacks at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Cinder Strike
skills.description: Melee or bow combo with three attacks. The first attack also creates a fiery explosion, damaging nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: The consecutive attack counter resets if you go 2 seconds without using Cinder Strike.Added damage applies to the first attack at 200% effectiveness, and to the other attacks at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Cluster Bomb
skills.description: Create secondary explosions from your Acid Flask. These can potentially hit the same target hit by the primary explosion.Added damage applies at 50% effectiveness.

skills.name: Coagulated Blood
skills.description: Combine the excess coagulated blood into an orb that seeks out the nearest enemy and explodes, hitting all nearby enemies.Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Coagulated Blood
skills.description: Combine the excess coagulated blood into an orb that seeks out the nearest enemy and explodes, hitting all nearby enemies.Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Collapse
skills.description: A wave of cold energy that erupts from Black Hole.

skills.name: Combined Lightning Strike
skills.description: The companion ability of your Storm Crows.Your crows call down a single massive lightning strike on a target enemy, hitting all enemies in the area. The damage is multiplied by the number of crows contributing to it.

skills.name: Consecrated Ground
skills.description: Allies on the consecrated ground are healed for 50 health each second.Enemies on Consecrate Ground take fire damage over time that scales with spell damage. Consecrate Ground gains 1 Spell Damage per 5% increased healing effectiveness.Added spell damage applies at 375% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Corpse Parasite
skills.description: Summon a corpse parasite that will attack nearby enemies for 4 seconds, dealing melee physical damage.
skills.additionalInfo: Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Dagger Throw
skills.description: Throw 3 shurikens in a cone.

skills.name: Dancing Strikes
skills.description: Requires dual wielding.A series of fast dash attacks. Dancing Strikes' movement does not scale with attack speed, but it gains increased cooldown recovery speed and more damage equal to 50% of your total increased melee attack speed.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied to each attack at 150% effectiveness.Your total increased melee attack speed includes the modifier from attack rate and generic increased attack speed stats. If your Melee Attack Speed is 1.5, then Dancing Strikes gains 25% increased cooldown recovery speed and 25% more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

skills.name: Dancing Strikes
skills.description: Requires dual wielding.A series of fast dash attacks. Dancing Strikes' movement does not scale with attack speed, but it gains increased cooldown recovery speed and more damage equal to 50% of your total increased melee attack speed.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied to each attack at 150% effectiveness.Your total increased melee attack speed includes the modifier from attack rate and generic increased attack speed stats. If your Melee Attack Speed is 1.5, then Dancing Strikes gains 25% increased cooldown recovery speed and 25% more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

skills.name: Dancing Strikes
skills.description: Requires dual wielding.A series of fast dash attacks. Dancing Strikes' movement does not scale with attack speed, but it gains increased cooldown recovery speed and more damage equal to 50% of your total increased melee attack speed.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied to each attack at 150% effectiveness.Your total increased melee attack speed includes the modifier from attack rate and generic increased attack speed stats. If your Melee Attack Speed is 1.5, then Dancing Strikes gains 25% increased cooldown recovery speed and 25% more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

skills.name: Death Seal
skills.description: Releases a Wave of Death dealing damage based on how long Death Seal has been actve and your current percent missing health.

skills.name: Decoy
skills.description: Throw a device to create a decoy that taunts enemies around it for 3 seconds before exploding.
skills.additionalInfo: Added throwing attack damage is applied at 600% effectiveness to the explosion.

skills.name: Defiling Nova
skills.description: A wave of defilement erupts from you, hitting enemies in an expanding area dealing spell physical damage on hit. Your poison chance applies at 500% of its normal value to the wave's hits.

skills.name: Descend
skills.description: Teleport to the target location, dealing physical damage to enemies in the area.

skills.name: Detonate Body
skills.description: Rips apart an allied minion, dealing physical damage to enemies around it. Added damage applies at double effectiveness.

skills.name: Detonate Decoy
skills.description: Detonate your decoys instantly.

skills.name: Detonate Ground
skills.description: After a short delay the ground erupts in a firey explosion.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Devouring Souls
skills.description: Calls forth five hungering souls that seeks out enemies, on hit they deal necrotic damage and then possesses the target.Possessed enemies take necrotic damage over time for 1.5 seconds. Enemies cannot be possessed by multiple souls at once.
skills.additionalInfo: Possess's damage counts as spell damage and it is affected by modifiers to base spell damage.Added spell damage applies to the initial hit at 200% and to possess at 100% per second for 1.5 seconds.

skills.name: Dive
skills.description: Dash a short fixed distance in the target direction dealing damage to all enemies in your path.
skills.additionalInfo: Dive's cooldown does not recover while you are using it.Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness

skills.name: Divine Flare
skills.description: A holy blast which deals spell fire damage to nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 350% effectiveness.

skills.name: Double Strike
skills.description: Two rapid melee attacks which strike all enemies in front of the abomination.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 200% effectiveness for each hit of Double Strike.

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area around you sending out tremors to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Elemental Nova
skills.description: Cast a ball of fire dealing moderate damage

skills.name: Energy Wave
skills.description: Release a small wave of spell physical energy that has a set distance and travels through enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Ensnaring Roots
skills.description: Call forth a wave of roots that grows outwards in a wide cone in front of you. The wave deals physical damage and roots enemies it hits for 1.5 seconds. Rooted enemies take physical damage over time until they are freed.Added spell damage applies at 100% to the initial hit and 200% per second to the damage over time.
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies to the damage over time at 200% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Entangling Roots
skills.description: Smites a target enemy with a bolt of holy fire that descends from the sky, healing allies around the target for 60 health. If you are in the area you are also healed.Cannot be used without a target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 150% effectiveness

skills.name: Eternal Arrow
skills.description: The abomination's archer shoots an arrow that seeks the heart of a nearby target, passing harmlessly through other enemies. Whenever it hits its target it has a chance to continue through it and Recurve to strike it again. Subsequent Recurve chance is multiplied by 0.8 each time the arrow Recurves. If the target dies, it will choose a new target.
skills.additionalInfo: Base recurve chance is 100%.Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Explosion
skills.description: Explodes caster dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Explosion
skills.description: Explodes caster dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Explosive Ground
skills.description: Creates a patch of explosive ground that detonates after 3 seconds.

skills.name: Explosive Orb
skills.description: Volcanic Orb explodes at the end of its duration, dealing damage in an area.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Explosive Trap
skills.description: Throw a device to create a Decoy that taunts enemies around it for 2.5 seconds before exploding.
skills.additionalInfo: Added throwing attack damage is applied at 600% effectiveness to the explosion.The Decoy cannot be destroyed before it expires.

skills.name: Explosives
skills.description: Trigger explosive devices, damaging enemies in a small area.Your Ballista's added bow damage is applied at 250% effectiveness.

skills.name: Explosives
skills.description: Trigger explosive devices, damaging enemies in a small area.Your Ballista's added bow damage is applied at 250% effectiveness.

skills.name: Falling Javelin
skills.description: Call a meteor from the sky that deals a large amount of damage upon landing. Added damage is applied at 750% effectiveness.

skills.name: Feather Knives
skills.description: Your Falcon throws out several sharp feathers at nearby enemies dealing physical damage and scales with the Falcon's throwing damage.This effect has a 10 second cooldown.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 250% effectiveness.

skills.name: Featherfall
skills.description: Razorsharp feathers fall from the sky striking enemies in a wide area around the target location dealing physical damage and scales with the Falcon's throwing damage.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 400% effectiveness.

skills.name: Featherstorm
skills.description: A torrent of sharp feathers that rain down over enemies dealing physical damage over time and scales with the Falcon's throwing damage.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 250% effectiveness each second.

skills.name: Featherstorm
skills.description: A torrent of sharp feathers that rain down over enemies dealing physical damage over time and scales with the Falcon's throwing damage.

skills.description: An explosion that deals fire damage in an area.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Fire Glyph
skills.description: Create a glyph that explodes after a moment, dealing damage in an area.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Fire Nova
skills.description: Casts a nova around you that deals fire damage.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 130% effectiveness.

skills.name: Fire Trail
skills.description: Leaves a trail of fire behind you, igniting enemies each second.

skills.name: Flame Breath
skills.description: Your raptor breathes fire on enemies in a cone in front of it, dealing fire spell damage over time for 1 second.
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 400% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Flame Burst
skills.description: A burst of flame that deals high damage in an area around the target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 500% effectiveness.

skills.name: Flame Wave
skills.description: Launch a wave of flame toward the target, hitting all enemies in its path.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Force Wave
skills.description: Strike with such force that your blows extend further, granting additional range. Does not hit targets already hit by the attack that generated the Force Wave.This still counts as a melee attack.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 50% effectiveness.

skills.name: Forge Breath
skills.description: Deals fire damage in a cone. Added spell damage applies a 350% effectiveness.

skills.name: Forge Flames
skills.description: Radiates extreme heat, dealing fire damage to enemies within 2.5 meters.
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage is applied at 200% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Freezing Blast
skills.description: An icy wave that erupts from you which deals no damage, but has 400 Freeze Rate.

skills.name: Freezing Cascade
skills.description: Creates a cascade of freezing novas. Whenever an enemy is hit by a nova another one is created around them. Each ice nova has a freeze rate of 40.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 120% effectiveness.Each enemy can only be hit by a maximum of one freezing nova.

skills.name: Freezing Grasp
skills.description: Creates a nova around the caster that deals cold damage and has a freeze rate of 200.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Frenzy Tether
skills.description: Tethers an enemy, gives tethered actors +100% increased damage

skills.name: Frigid Tempest
skills.description: Conjures a spear of frost that pierces enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Frost Claw
skills.description: Three projectiles arc to the target location to create a burst of frost. Added spell damage applies to the burst at 100% effectiveness and it has a freeze rate of 40.

skills.name: Frost Nova
skills.description: A circle of biting frost that deals cold damage and has a chance to freeze on hit.
skills.additionalInfo: Frost Nova has a freeze rate of 40.Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Frostbolt
skills.description: Cast a homing bolt of ice towards the target.
skills.additionalInfo: Base freeze rate of 50

skills.description: Leave a circle of frozen ground which chills enemies that stand on it.

skills.name: Furnace
skills.description: Spews sweltering heat in a cone in front of you, dealing fire damage over time.Added damage applies at 240% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Gathering Storm
skills.description: Strike at your enemy with a mighty lightning powered storm. When you use Gathering Storm and hit at least one enemy, you gain a Storm Stack. Every second you expend a Storm Stack to cause a Storm Bolt to strike a nearby enemy. This interval is reduced by 2% for every stack you currently have.
skills.additionalInfo: The attack deals melee lightning damage with added damage applying at 100% effectiveness, and the Storm Bolt deals spell lightning damage with added damage applying at 100% effectiveness.Increased area for area skills stats apply to the melee attack and to the damage area of the Storm Bolt, but not to the area in which enemies are targeted by Storm Bolts.

skills.name: Gathering Storm
skills.description: Strike at your enemy with a mighty lightning powered storm. When you use Gathering Storm and hit at least one enemy, you gain a Storm Stack. Every second you expend a Storm Stack to cause a Storm Bolt to strike a nearby enemy. This interval is reduced by 2% for every stack you currently have.
skills.additionalInfo: The attack deals melee lightning damage with added damage applying at 100% effectiveness, and the Storm Bolt deals spell lightning damage with added damage applying at 100% effectiveness.Increased area for area skills stats apply to the melee attack and to the damage area of the Storm Bolt, but not to the area in which enemies are targeted by Storm Bolts.

skills.name: Give Berry
skills.description: Gives a berry to the target, healing them.

skills.name: Glyph of Dominion Explosion
skills.description: Create a wall that chills enemies who walk through it.

skills.name: Greater Ice Vortex
skills.description: Cast a greater swirling vortex of cold damage over time that lasts for 4 seconds.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Harpoon
skills.description: Fires an arrow in a target direction

skills.name: Healing Hands
skills.description: Dash a short fixed distance in the target direction.
skills.additionalInfo: Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

skills.additionalInfo: Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

skills.name: Health Orb
skills.description: Heals the first friendly actor that comes into contact with it.

skills.name: Holy Eruption
skills.description: An eruption of holy power that deals spell fire damage to enemies and heals 80 health to nearby allies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Holy Flame Burst
skills.description: Creates a burst of holy fire around you.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Holy Symbol
skills.description: A triggered self heal that also grants ward every second over 3 seconds. It has a 3 second cooldown.

skills.name: Holy Trail
skills.description: Creates a trail of holy fire and lightning which damages enemies standing on it.Added spell damage applies at 250% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Ice Arrow
skills.description: Fires an arrow in a target direction

skills.name: Ice Bite
skills.description: Bites the enemy with icy fangs, dealing melee cold damage. Added damage applies at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Ice Nova
skills.description: Casts a nova around you that deals cold damage.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 120% effectiveness.

skills.name: Ice Shard
skills.description: Cast a razor sharp shard of ice at the target direction.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Ice Shard
skills.description: Cast a razor sharp shard of ice at the target direction.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Ice Shield
skills.description: Creates a shield in a target direction that repeatedly casts frostbolt in that direction.
skills.additionalInfo: Frostbolts are cold projectiles that create an ice explosion on hit.The shards and explosions have a freeze rate of 12.

skills.name: Ice Spike
skills.description: Cast an ice spike towards your enemy.Ice Spike deals additional spell damage based on your added melee damage gaining +1 spell damage per 3 added melee damage. Added spell damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Ice Spiral
skills.description: Releases a barrage of frost arrows that travel in a spiral. Each enemy can only be hit at most once every 0.3 seconds. The hits have a freeze rate of 70 and added spell damage applies to them at 175% effectiveness.

skills.name: Ice Thorns
skills.description: Releases a burst of homing ice thorns that deal physical and cold damage on hit and have a freeze rate of 18
skills.additionalInfo: Multiple thorns cannot hit the same target.Freeze rate grants a chance to freeze on hit that is higher against enemies with lower health.Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Ice Vortex
skills.description: Cast a swirling vortex of cold damage over time that lasts for 4 seconds.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 40% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Infernal Aura
skills.description: Deals a burst of fire damage, then fire damage over time around the caster for 10 seconds.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the burst at 250% effectiveness, and to the damage over time at 20% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Infernal Aura
skills.description: Deals a burst of fire damage, then fire damage over time around the caster for 10 seconds.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the burst at 250% effectiveness, and to the damage over time at 20% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Infest
skills.description: Converts your 2 nearest vines into hives and then transforms you into Swarmblade Form.

skills.name: Iron Blade
skills.description: Launches a blade towards an enemy, dealing melee physical damage.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Javelin
skills.description: Hurl a javelin that pierces through every enemy in its path.
skills.additionalInfo: This is a throwing attack that scales with throwing attack damage and throwing attack speed. It is not a melee attack or spell.

skills.name: Kinetic Burst
skills.description: Destroy your enemies so forcefully that they generate a burst of physical damage around them as they die.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: KnockBack
skills.description: Radius is 3

skills.name: Lava Burst
skills.description: Cast a burst of molten lava, hitting the target and nearby enemies dealing spell fire damage.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Leap Attack
skills.description: Leap to the target location

skills.name: Leap Attack
skills.description: Leap to the target location

skills.name: Lightning Blast
skills.description: Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.Drains 20 mana per second.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 250% effectiveness each second. Damage reduces while rotating.

skills.name: Lightning Blast
skills.description: Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.Drains 20 mana per second.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 250% effectiveness each second. Damage reduces while rotating.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: A bolt of lightning directly strikes the target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Lightning Nova
skills.description: Casts a nova around you that deals lightning damage.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 120% effectiveness.

skills.name: Lightning Spear
skills.description: A spear of lightning that emerges from the Javelin and seeks out a nearby enemy, piercing all in its path.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Lightning Tendrils
skills.description: A bolt of lightning created by the detonation, jumping to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Lightning Wave
skills.description: Release a wave of lightning in an area around you.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Locust Swarm
skills.description: Surrounds you with a swarm of locusts that deals melee damage over time.Has a base duration of 4 seconds. Only one Locust Swarm can exist at once.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Mana Arc
skills.description: An arc of lightning from your mana blade that strikes each enemy hit by Mana Strike.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Maul
skills.description: Slam the ground with your weapon damaging enemies in a large area and creating 2 to 4 aftershocks nearby.
skills.additionalInfo: Added melee damage applies at 250% effectiveness.

skills.name: Maul
skills.description: Slam the ground with your weapon damaging enemies in a large area and creating 2 to 4 aftershocks nearby.
skills.additionalInfo: Added melee damage applies at 250% effectiveness.

skills.name: Melee Attack
skills.description: Attacks enemies in an area in front of the abomination.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Melee Attack
skills.description: Attacks enemies in an area in front of the abomination.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Melee Attack
skills.description: Attacks enemies in an area in front of the abomination.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Melee Attack
skills.description: Attacks enemies in an area in front of the abomination.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Melee Attack
skills.description: Attacks enemies in an area in front of the abomination.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Meteor
skills.description: Call a meteor from the sky that deals a large amount of damage upon landing. Added damage is applied at 950% effectiveness.

skills.name: Mystic Thorns
skills.description: Fires a thorn in a random direction

skills.name: Net Trap
skills.description: Throws a trap that releases a net at a nearby enemy when it triggers.You can have a maximum of 6 Net Traps active at once and they last up to 30 seconds.
skills.additionalInfo: Added throwing attack damage is applied at 600% effectiveness to the explosion.The Decoy cannot be destroyed before it expires.

skills.name: Poison Bolt
skills.description: Launch a projectile that inflicts poison.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Poison Burst
skills.description: Deals a small amount of physical damage and has 100% chance to poison on hit.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Poison Pool
skills.description: Leave a pool of poison the ground for several seconds that poisons enemies within it each second.

skills.name: Profane Form
skills.description: Hold ability key to channel for up to 2 seconds. While channelling you are transformed into a fog of cursed energy that deals necrotic damage over time to nearby enemies. While in this form you dodge all hits, but can still take damage over time.
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 200% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Profane Oblation
skills.description: Rips apart an allied minion, dealing necrotic damage to enemies around it. Added spell damage applies at 350% effectiveness.

skills.name: Pull
skills.description: Radius is 3

skills.name: Push Away
skills.description: Radius is 3

skills.name: Putrid Bomb
skills.description: Create a globule of poison that bursts after 1 second.Your poison chance applies at 250% of its normal value to hits from this ability.

skills.name: Putrid Bomb
skills.description: Create a globule of poison that bursts after 1 second.Your poison chance applies at 250% of its normal value to hits from this ability.

skills.name: Rain of Arrows
skills.description: Launch a hail of arrows into the sky that hits all enemies in an area around the target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Raptor Screech
skills.description: Your raptor emits a vicious screech, dealing damage to and shredding the armor of nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Razor Wings
skills.description: Your falcon swoops towards the target location, hitting all enemies in its path.
skills.additionalInfo: Your falcon's added melee damage applies at 500% effectiveness.

skills.name: Retribution
skills.description: A melee physical attack that hits nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Riposte
skills.description: A retaliatory melee attack performed automatically upon being hit.You take less damage from the hit that triggers the riposte.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Rive
skills.description: A combo of three melee attacks. Every third consecutive attack with Rive slashes in a full circle around the character, dealing double damage.
skills.additionalInfo: The consecutive attack counter resets if you go 3 seconds without using Rive.Added melee damage applies to the first two hits at 125% effectiveness and to the third hit at 250% effectiveness.

skills.name: Rive
skills.description: A combo of three melee attacks. Every third consecutive attack with Rive slashes in a full circle around the character, dealing double damage.
skills.additionalInfo: The consecutive attack counter resets if you go 3 seconds without using Rive.Added melee damage applies to the first two hits at 125% effectiveness and to the third hit at 250% effectiveness.

skills.name: Roar
skills.description: Unleash a thunderous roar which knocks enemies back and stuns them for 1.5 seconds. Rares and bosses are stunned for half as long.. All effects from your Warcry Skill Tree are applied to Roar.20% of remaining cooldown recovered whenever you stun (or freeze if Warcry is converted to cold) an enemy, including with Roar itself. This effect can occur a maximum of two times each second.

skills.name: Rune Ember
skills.description: Fires an ember of a rune at a nearby enemy.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Rune Explosion
skills.description: Create a burst of fire damage around a minion. Has 400% added damage effectiveness.

skills.name: Runebolt
skills.description: A combo spell that fires piercing projectiles. The first part of the combo is fire, the second is cold, and the third is lightning.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness. The cold rune bolt has a freeze rate of 40.

skills.name: Runebolt
skills.description: A combo spell that fires piercing projectiles. The first part of the combo is fire, the second is cold, and the third is lightning.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness. The cold rune bolt has a freeze rate of 40.

skills.name: Runebolt
skills.description: A combo spell that fires piercing projectiles. The first part of the combo is fire, the second is cold, and the third is lightning.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness. The cold rune bolt has a freeze rate of 40.

skills.name: Runestone
skills.description: A conduit which focuses and multiplies your runebolts.

skills.name: Runic Burst
skills.description: A sudden burst of fire damage in a small area around the target
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 100% effectiveness

skills.name: Runic Detonation
skills.description: Creates an explosion of cold spell damage after a brief delay
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 100% effectiveness

skills.name: Seed
skills.description: Throw 3 shurikens in a cone.

skills.name: Shade Eruption
skills.description: An explosion that deals fire damage in an area.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Shadow Daggers
skills.description: Upon reaching 4 stacks of Shadow Daggers, the Daggers plunge into the target, dealing physical damage. This damage always critically strikes.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 340% effectiveness.

skills.name: Shadow Dive Bomb
skills.description: Call a meteor from the sky that deals a large amount of damage upon landing. Added damage is applied at five times its normal value.

skills.name: Shatter
skills.description: Shatters the frozen enemy, dealing cold damage to enemies around it.

skills.name: Shatter Strike Left
skills.description: A sweeping melee attack that strikes enemies in a circle around you dealing cold damage and culling frozen enemies at low health.Has a freeze rate of 50.

skills.name: Shatter Strike Right
skills.description: A sweeping melee attack that strikes enemies in a circle around you dealing cold damage and culling frozen enemies at low health.Has a freeze rate of 50.

skills.name: Shatter Totem
skills.description: Shatters the totem, destroying it to deal physical damage to all nearby enemies and restore 2 health per attunement to you.Has 400% added damage effectiveness.
skills.additionalInfo: Upheaval Totems cannot be shattered.

skills.name: Shield Shatter
skills.description: Launch shield fragments in a cone in front of you.

skills.name: Shield Throw
skills.description: Throws a shield at a target enemy. The shield ricochets to up to 2 additional targets before returning to you.The cooldown starts when the shield returns to you.
skills.additionalInfo: The shield hits all enemies in its path, even those it does not ricochet from.Added throwing attack damage is applied at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Shrapnel
skills.description: Fires a piece of burning shrapnel in a random direction.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Sky Beam
skills.description: A Holy Beam descends from the sky dealing fire damage over time to enemies in the target area, and healing allies in the target area for 50 health per second.

skills.name: Smoke Bomb
skills.description: Dash a short fixed distance in the target direction.
skills.additionalInfo: Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

skills.name: Sonic Wave
skills.description: Your Decoy emits a piercing sound that afflicts enemies around it with armor shred and frailty.

skills.name: Soul Blast
skills.description: Create a burst of necrotic damage in an area around the target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Soul Feast
skills.description: Feasts on the souls of cursed enemies, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing fragments of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 3 ward when they reach you.Feasts on up to 13 enemies, prioritising those closest to you.
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage is applied at 250% effectiveness.

skills.name: Soul Reave
skills.description: A necrotic melee attack that hits all enemies in a wide area. This attack has 15% more radius compared to the abomination's basic melee attack.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Spark Charge
skills.description: Spark charges explode after 1 second dealing lightning damage to nearby enemies. Spark charges automatically detonate when the enemy they are attached to dies.

skills.name: Spark Nova
skills.description: Deals lightning damage around the target area.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Spirit Plauge
skills.description: Spread the most recently applied Spirit Plague to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Spirit Wolves
skills.description: Your summoned wolves release spirit wolves that travel through enemies in a line, dealing melee physical damage.Each spirit wolf scales with the stats of the wolf that released it.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Stomp
skills.description: Freezes enemies in a cone in front of you. Freeze lasts for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Stomp
skills.description: Freezes enemies in a cone in front of you. Freeze lasts for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Stomp
skills.description: Freezes enemies in a cone in front of you. Freeze lasts for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Storm Orb
skills.description: Create an orb that explodes after one second, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 50% effectiveness.

skills.name: Stygian Beam
skills.description: Shoot a quick necrotic beam at the target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Summon Ancestral Sabertooth
skills.description: Creates an ancestral spirit sabertooth which will attack your enemies for 4 seconds before dissipating. Ancestral sabertooths have the same stats as your sabertooth, but can't use abilities other than basic attack.

skills.name: Summon Baby Scorpion
skills.description: Summons baby scorpions which will follow your scorpion around and attack enemies. Baby scorpions receive the same stats as your scorpion.
skills.additionalInfo: The scorpion has 400 base health and is resistant to powerful area attacks. Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Summon Ballista Shield
skills.description: Summons a shield in front of the ballista to block incoming projectiles.

skills.name: Summon Blood Golem
skills.description: Summons a bone golem, which attacks slowly, but retaliates with a bone nova when it takes 70 damage.

skills.name: Summon Blood Specter
skills.description: Summons a specter that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains.

skills.name: Summon Bone Golem
skills.description: Summons a bone golem, which attacks slowly, but retaliates with a bone nova when it takes 70 damage.

skills.name: Summon Bone Golem
skills.description: Summons a bone golem, which attacks slowly, but retaliates with a bone nova when it takes 70 damage.

skills.name: Summon Bone Prison
skills.description: Summons a bone prison around a target area.The Bone Prison is considered a minion and is made up of several small sections, each with 300 base health.

skills.name: Summon Claw Totem
skills.description: Summons a totem that attacks with Swipe. It only scales with totem and minion stats, but it is affected by your Swipe Tree.Claw Totems have 120 base health and last for 12 seconds.

skills.name: Summon Coldstone Elemental
skills.description: Summon a coldstone elemental with decaying health to attack your enemies.

skills.name: Summon Cryomancer
skills.description: Summons a skeleton mage to assist you. You are limited to 2 mages at a time.
skills.additionalInfo: Skeleton mages have 100 base health. Press A to give your minions an attack command.You will always summon the skeleton type you have the fewest of.

skills.name: Summon Death Knight
skills.description: Summons a Skeleton Death Knight to assist you.
skills.additionalInfo: Skeleton Death Knights have 200 base health and 15% base critical strike chance. Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Summon Healing Totem
skills.description: Summons a totem that heals nearby allies. Healing totems have 100 base health and last 6 seconds.

skills.name: Summon Healing Totem
skills.description: Summons a totem that heals nearby allies. Healing totems have 100 base health and last 6 seconds.

skills.name: Summon Hive
skills.description: Summons a Hive that releases Locusts while enemies are nearby. You can have a maximum of three Hives by default and each Hive contains 12 Locusts.You are limited to 12 active Locusts and each Locust lasts up to 12 seconds.
skills.additionalInfo: The rate at which it summons Locusts scales with minion cast speed. Locusts scale with your minion stats.

skills.name: Summon Mirror Image
skills.description: Summon a mirror image to distract your foes.

skills.name: Summon Poison Wisp
skills.description: Summons a Necrotic Wisp which lasts 10 seconds.

skills.name: Summon Pyromancer
skills.description: Summons a skeleton mage to assist you. You are limited to 2 mages at a time.
skills.additionalInfo: Skeleton mages have 100 base health. Press A to give your minions an attack command.You will always summon the skeleton type you have the fewest of.

skills.name: Summon Revenant
skills.description: Summons a revenant that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains.

skills.name: Summon Skeleton
skills.description: Summon a Skeleton Mage to fight your enemies. It casts Hungering Souls every second.

skills.name: Summon Skeleton
skills.description: Summon a Skeleton Mage to fight your enemies. It casts Hungering Souls every second.

skills.name: Summon Skeleton
skills.description: Summon a Skeleton Mage to fight your enemies. It casts Hungering Souls every second.

skills.name: Summon Skeleton
skills.description: Summon a Skeleton Mage to fight your enemies. It casts Hungering Souls every second.

skills.name: Summon Skeleton Vanguard
skills.description: Summon a Skeleton Vanguard wielding a spear which fights for you.

skills.name: Summon Soul Wisp
skills.description: Summons a wisp which lasts 10 seconds.

skills.name: Summon Tempest Totem
skills.description: Summons a totem that repeatedly casts a Tempest.
skills.additionalInfo: Tempest totems have 100 base health and last 8 seconds.

skills.name: Summon Upheaval Totem
skills.description: Summons a totem that repeatedly attacks with Upheaval.
skills.additionalInfo: Upheaval totems have 100 base health and lasts 8 seconds.

skills.name: Summon Vine
skills.description: Summons 1 poisonous vine.Vines are melee minions that inflict poison on hit. You can have up to 12 vines.

skills.name: Summon Warcry Totem
skills.description: Summons a totem that repeatedly grants casts Warcry.
skills.additionalInfo: Warcry totems have 100 base health and last 3 seconds.

skills.name: Swipe
skills.description: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

skills.name: Swipe
skills.description: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

skills.name: Syncronized Strike
skills.description: A series of fast dash attacks.

skills.name: Tail Slam
skills.description: A melee physical hit followed by a powerful cascading explosion. The explosion counts as a fire spell and applies ignite on hit.Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness to the melee hit and 200% effectiveness to the explosion.Increased Area for Minion Area Skills applies to the melee hit, but not the cascading explosion.

skills.name: Tempest Strike
skills.description: A melee combo attack that cycles through a cold strike, a physical strike, and a lightning strike that trigger elemental Tempest spells of the same damage type if the strikes hit at least one enemy.Cold strike: Triggers a Frigid Tempest, which is a cold projectile that pierces through enemies.Physical strike: Triggers a Wind Tempest, which is a small twister that lasts a short duration dealing physical damage per over time.Lightning strike: Triggers a Thunder Tempest, which is an expanding storm of lightning bolts.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage for the melee strikes apply at 100% effectiveness.Frigid Tempest: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.Wind Tempest: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness per second.Thunder Tempest: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Tempest Strike
skills.description: A melee combo attack that cycles through a cold strike, a physical strike, and a lightning strike that trigger elemental Tempest spells of the same damage type if the strikes hit at least one enemy.Cold strike: Triggers a Frigid Tempest, which is a cold projectile that pierces through enemies.Physical strike: Triggers a Wind Tempest, which is a small twister that lasts a short duration dealing physical damage per over time.Lightning strike: Triggers a Thunder Tempest, which is an expanding storm of lightning bolts.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage for the melee strikes apply at 100% effectiveness.Frigid Tempest: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.Wind Tempest: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness per second.Thunder Tempest: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Thorn Burst
skills.description: Releases a burst of thorns, damaging all nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Thorn Shield Burst
skills.description: Releases a burst of thorns, damaging all nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Thorn Volley
skills.description: Releases a burst of thorns towards enemies in the target direction. Thorns deal physical damage on hit and multiple thorns can hit the same target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 60% effectiveness. 40% less chance to apply ailments on hit.

skills.name: Thunder Tempest
skills.description: Conjures a wave of lightning that damages all enemies around you.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Tidal Wave
skills.description: A wave of crashing water dealing spell cold damage and chilling enemies in a wide area.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 400% effectiveness.

skills.name: Time Bubble
skills.description: Creates a bubble where time moves slower than the space around it. Slows enemies caught in the time bubble and shreds their void resistance.

skills.name: Time Lock
skills.description: Time Locks all nearby enemies for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Time Wave
skills.description: Release a torrent of time distortion around you, damaging nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 250% effectiveness.

skills.name: Tormenting Spirit
skills.description: Tormenting Spirits hits enemies and inflicts them with Torment, dealing necrotic damage over time.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage for the Spirits applies at 30% effectiveness.Torment applies 18% less movement speed (multiplicative with other modifiers), deals 120 damage over 3 seconds and added damage applies at 200% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Tsunami
skills.description: Creates a frigid cascading Tsunami around you that deals cold damage in an area.
skills.additionalInfo: If cast by Maelstrom, the total damage is multiplied by the number of Maelstrom stacks you reached.Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Twister
skills.description: Conjures a Twister that moves at random, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing physical damage to them.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the damage over time at 50% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Twisters
skills.description: Conjures 2 to 4 twisters that move at random, dealing physical damage to enemies they pass through each second.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the damage over time at 75% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Umbral Blades
skills.description: Recall all Umbral Blades to you, hitting enemies along the way.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 60% effectiveness. 40% less chance to apply ailments on hit.

skills.name: Umbral Blades
skills.description: Recall all Umbral Blades to you, hitting enemies along the way.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 60% effectiveness. 40% less chance to apply ailments on hit.

skills.name: Vale Spirit
skills.description: Creates a Vale Spirit which orbits you for a short time. During this time you automatically shoot nearby enemies with Spirit Thorns from the Vale Spirit.
skills.additionalInfo: The Spirit Thorns cast through Vale Spirit use your stats.

skills.name: Void Aegis
skills.description: If you take a hit that deals at least 25% of your max health as damage, sacrifice a void essence to gain Void Aegis for 4 seconds, which grants a portion of your maximum health gained as endurance threshold.

skills.name: Void Beam
skills.description: Casts 4 powerful void sky beams that travel at random.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 300% effectiveness each second.

skills.name: Void Beam
skills.description: Casts 4 powerful void sky beams that travel at random.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 300% effectiveness each second.

skills.name: Void Beam
skills.description: Casts 4 powerful void sky beams that travel at random.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 300% effectiveness each second.

skills.name: Void Beam
skills.description: Casts 4 powerful void sky beams that travel at random.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 300% effectiveness each second.

skills.name: Void Bolt
skills.description: Launches a bolt of piercing void energy at a nearby enemy.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Void Eruption
skills.description: An orb of pure void energy, seeking out your enemies and destroying them.

skills.name: Volatile Flask
skills.description: Throw a highly explosive flask at a target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Volatile Reversal
skills.description: A combo ability that jumps forwards in time to a target location and performs a melee attack on arrival. Recast within 3 seconds to jump backwards in time to your original location and perform a melee attack on arrival.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the melee attacks at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Volatile Reversal
skills.description: A combo ability that jumps forwards in time to a target location and performs a melee attack on arrival. Recast within 3 seconds to jump backwards in time to your original location and perform a melee attack on arrival.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the melee attacks at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Vomit
skills.description: Vomits to death over 3 seconds, dealing a mixture of physical and poison damage over time to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Wandering Spirit
skills.description: Summon a primal wolf to guard you and attack your enemies

skills.name: War Slash
skills.description: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 400% effectiveness.

skills.name: Wave of Death
skills.description: Releases a Wave of Death dealing damage based on how long Death Seal has been actve and your current percent missing health.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 500% effectiveness.

skills.name: Whirlwind Strike
skills.description: The Manifest Armor quickly spins, hitting all enemies around it. Added damage applies at 300% effectiveness.

skills.name: Wind Tempest
skills.description: Conjures a whirlwind that moves a short distance forwards, dealing damage over time to enemies in its path.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the damage over time at 150% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Wing Burst
skills.description: After Aerial Assault your Falcon releases a quick burst of sharp feathers from its wings at nearby enemies dealing physical damage that scales with the Falcon's throwing damage.
skills.additionalInfo: Added throwing damage applies at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Wisdom of the Storm
skills.description: Grants an ally Aspect of the Crow.Aspect of the Crow grants +3 melee lightning damage and +3 spell lightning damage for a base duration of 8 seconds and can stack.

skills.name: Zap
skills.description: Zaps up to five nearby enemies, dealing lightning damage.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 250% effectiveness.

skills.name: Zombie Leap
skills.description: Leap to the target location
